ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: I played with one family on Solusek Ro 3 generations played grandma in her 50s parents in their 30s youngest was a 10 year old girl and she rocked her brothers
ygData.messageBody:
I played with one family on Solusek Ro
3 generations played
grandma in her 50s
parents in their 30s
youngest was a 10 year old girl and she rocked
her brothers though, they were a bunch of begging pains in
the butt!!!!


--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Yeah, it is amazing the range of ages of players. I've
> seen as young as 7
> and as old as 75 playing. My mom plays and she's 52.
> luv,
> -Su
>
